title: Use returned funds to rebuy $sushi for dev fund (with fairer quorum)
body:
TL;DR:

-ChefNomi had drained the $SUSHI from the dev fund.
-He returned $14M worth of $ETH but the Sushi fund is lacking its $SUSHI which was sold into the market.
-For the long term, the fund should be denoted in $SUSHI to align incentives.
-The community should vote to use some portion of the funds to rebuy SUSHI from the market.
-The Community can decide what % of $SUSHI to rebuy.

How much of the $ETH from the Dev Fund should be spent rebuying $SUSHI?
choices: Don't use any of the ETH
author: 0x2e37561E5cd35E649F4aCad3cAA6be8B16c87C13
